title: France panorama. [No. 75/02]
brief_description: French cinemagazine itmes including: 1. The many faces of Paris: Reflections on a site - artists’ conceptions of the Defense Quarter. Walls - beautifying a city. 2. Of fish and men - ecological research on the marine environment. 3. Vocations - the 1974 Vocational Scholarships. 4. The arts - an African painter in Paris.
